TextEng: "Quiet. I'm the one who asks the questions here!"
"You were dead. I just raised you. Can you remember anything?"
Text: "너 죽었었어. 내가 되살린 거야. 뭐 기억나는 거 있어?"

TextEng: "I'm <FirstName>. I saw you in the tavern with Durnan."
Text: "난 <FirstName>야. 너 더난이랑 주점에 있는 거 봤어."

TextEng: "You don't remember me? I spoke to your group at the tavern."
Text: "날 기억 못 해? 주점에서 너희 일행한테 말 걸었잖아."

TextEng: "You don't remember me? We spoke at the tavern."
"Then what happened?"
"I'll be going now."
"How about you join me?"
"That's a good point. I'm probably safer without you."
Text: "일리 있네. 너 없는 게 더 안전할 것 같아."

TextEng: "I'm willing to risk it. I could use a good healer."
"What are you going to do now?"
"That's probably for the best."
"Enough chit-chat. I think I'll just kill you now."
"Just kidding. Head on back to the inn."
"I just want the satisfaction of killing you myself." <StartAction>[Kill him.]</Start>
"This is all the thanks I get for bringing you back to life?"
"I guess you're right. I don't need a reward."
Text: "맞는 말이야. 보상 같은 거 필요 없어."

TextEng: "Not good enough. Guess I have to kill you."
"Why don't you come with me, instead?"
"Is there anything you can tell me about this area?"
Text: "이 지역에 대해 뭐 알려줄 거 있어?"

TextEng: "Do you know where your other companions are?"
"How did you end up stuffed inside that sarcophagus?"
Text: "어떻게 석관 안에 쳐박혀 있게 된 거야?"

TextEng: "You're pathetic. I should have just left you for dead."
"I'm sorry. I guess this whole situation is just getting to me."
Text: "미안해. 이 상황 때문에 좀 예민했나 봐."

TextEng: "Go back to the inn and find a corner to pray in. That's the only place someone as hopeless as you can be of any use."
Text: "주점 돌아가서 구석에서 기도나 해. 너 같은 쓸모없는 놈은 거기나 어울려."

TextEng: "As well as can be expected."
"I could use some help. Maybe you could join up with me?"
"Get back to your prayers. You've already proved you aren't good for much else."
Text: "기도나 하러 돌아가. 넌 그것밖에 못 한다는 거 증명했잖아."

TextEng: "Yeah, nobody had to come drag my sorry carcass out of there."
Text: "그래, 나는 아무도 거기서 끌어내 줄 필요 없었지."

TextEng: "You don't like me much, do you?"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I'm sorry about what I said to you before. I didn't mean it."
"I should go."
